chef_bio: Munira is a chef with 10 years of experience and has 50 recipes to her name. She is known for her Bengali Fish Curry, Beef Bhuna, and Mishti Doi recipes.

recipes.cooking_method: Fry fish, saute onion, ginger, garlic, tomato and spices, add water, add fish and cook until done.
Cook beef, saute onion, ginger, garlic and spices, add tomato and cook until the beef is tender.
Boil milk, cool it, add yogurt and sugar, mix well, cover and keep it in a warm place for 4-5 hours.

chef_bio: Mosharraf is a chef with 8 years of experience and has 30 recipes to his name. He is known for his Chicken Roast, Shahi Tukra, and Beef Haleem recipes.

recipes.cooking_method: Marinate chicken with spices, onion, ginger, garlic, and yogurt, roast until cooked.
Fry bread in ghee, boil milk, add sugar, cardamom and saffron, add fried bread, cook until milk is reduced.
Cook beef, lentil, wheat, and barley, saute onion and garlic, mix everything together and cook until it forms a thick paste.

chef_bio: Masuma is a chef with 15 years of experience and has 90 recipes to her name. She is known for her Shorshe Ilish, Beef Rezala, and Chomchom recipes.

recipes.cooking_method: Marinate fish with salt and turmeric, make a paste of mustard seeds and green chili, fry fish and pour mustard paste over it.
Cook beef with spices, saute onion, ginger, and garlic, add yogurt and cook until beef is tender.
Make chenna from milk, shape into cylindrical balls, boil sugar and water, add chenna and cook until soft.

chef_bio: Rushna is a chef with 16 years of experience and has 80 recipes to her name. She is known for her Beef Karahi, Nihari, and Gulab Jamun recipes.

recipes.cooking_method: Cook beef, saute onion, tomato, ginger, garlic, and spices, add green chili and coriander, cook until the beef is tender.
Cook beef, add spices, onion, ginger, and garlic, cook until the beef is tender and the gravy is thick.
Mix milk powder, flour, and oil, form balls, fry in oil, boil sugar and water, add cardamom and rose water, add fried balls.

chef_bio: Tareq is a Swedish chef with 20 years of experience and has 120 recipes to his name. He is known for his Swedish Meatballs, Gravlax, and Potato Gratin recipes.

recipes.cooking_method: Mix beef, bread crumbs, and onion, form balls, cook in butter, add cream, serve with lingonberry jam.
Mix salt, sugar, and dill, coat salmon, cover and refrigerate for 2-3 days, slice thinly, serve with mustard sauce.
Slice potatoes, mix with cream, garlic, and thyme, bake with cheese until golden brown.

chef_bio: Nadia is a chef with 15 years of experience and has 90 recipes to her name. She is known for her Biryani, Korma, and Rasgulla recipes

recipes.cooking_method: Marinate chicken, fry potatoes and onions, cook chicken with spices and potatoes, layer with rice and cook until done.
Cook chicken, saute onion, ginger, garlic, almond, and coconut, blend with yogurt, add chicken, and cook until the sauce thickens.
Boil milk, add lemon juice, drain the whey, knead the cheese, shape into balls, cook in sugar syrup.
